label: applicableProductionProcess
comment: A process applicable to this specified production cycle.
A production process applicable to this facility production unit.
A production process applicable to this trade product.

rangeIncludes.comment: A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.

domainIncludes.comment: A series of activities associated with the processing of a product.
A defined set of production processes under the single management of a facility.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
